data.author: Józef Piłsudski
data.quote: To be defeated and not submit, is victory; to be victorious and rest on one's laurels, is defeat.

data.author: Józef Piłsudski
data.quote: To want to, is to be able to.

data.author: Chinese Proverb
data.quote: The flowers of all the tomorrows are in the seeds of today.

data.author: Benjamin Franklin
data.quote: We are all born ignorant, but one must work hard to remain stupid.

data.author: Steve Carell
data.quote: You need to be a peli-CAN. Not peli-CAN'T.

data.author: Oprah Winfrey
data.quote: Turn your wounds into wisdom.

data.author: Albert Einstein
data.quote: Try not to become a person of success but a person of value.

data.author: Mahatma Gandhi
data.quote: We must be the change we wish to see in the world

data.author: African Proverb
data.quote: Even a slow walker will arrive.

data.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
data.quote: Self-trust is the first secret of success.

data.author: Mark Twain
data.quote: Humor is man's greatest blessing.

data.author: Russian Proverb
data.quote: Little drops of water wear down big stones.

data.author: Pablo Casals
data.quote: The person who works and is never bored is never old. Work and interest in worthwhile things are the best remedy for age.

data.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
data.quote: Men succeed when they realize that their failures are the preparation for their victories.

data.author: Albert Einstein
data.quote: Anyone who has never made a mistake has never tried anything new.

data.author: Nike, Inc.
data.quote: Just do it.

data.author: Samuel Johnson
data.quote: Clear your mind of can't.

data.author: Albert Einstein
data.quote: In the middle of difficulty lies opportunity.

data.author: James Cash (J.C.) Penney
data.quote: Long-range goals keep you from being frustrated by short-term failures.

data.author: Henry David Thoreau
data.quote: The question is not what you look at, but what you see.
